'''Dust''' may refer to:

== ''Minecraft'' ==

=== Items ===
* {{ItemLink|Glowstone Dust}} - an [[item]] obtained from mining [[glowstone]] blocks, which can be used in [[brewing]] or to create glowstone blocks.
* {{ItemLink|Redstone Dust}} - an item obtained from mining redstone ore, which can be placed as redstone wire, crafted into various [[redstone]]-related items or used in brewing.
* [[Particles (Java Edition)#Types of particles|Dust Particle]] - an type of particle emmited by blocks, usually redstone related, or displayed through commands, see about on '''dust''' section
** [[Particle format#Configurations of particle types|Dust Particle Configuration]] - the configuration to display said particle through commands, see on '''dust''' section

=== Unimplemented ===

* {{ObjectLink|Bluestone Dust}} - an animation error mistaken for a teaser in [[Village & Pillage: Official Trailer]]

== ''Minecraft Dungeons'' ==
* {{DuItemLink|Diamond Dust}} - an unused item used to upgrade the power level of gear
